meanings.definition: The quality or state of being masterful.
meanings.sent1: Her masterfulnesses in painting were evident in every brushstroke.
meanings.sent2: His masterfulnesses in leadership inspired the team to succeed.
meanings.sent3: The cat showed its masterfulnesses by catching the mouse effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: The masterfulnesses of the chef turned simple ingredients into a culinary masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The magician's masterfulnesses left the audience in awe.

meanings.definition: The ability to control or dominate a situation with skill and authority.
meanings.sent1: The general's masterfulnesses in battle led to victory.
meanings.sent2: Her masterfulnesses in negotiation always resulted in favorable outcomes.
meanings.sent3: The toddler displayed his masterfulnesses by getting everyone to play his favorite game.
meanings.sent4: The masterfulnesses of the conductor guided the orchestra to a flawless performance.
meanings.sent5: The detective's masterfulnesses solved the case in record time.
